ops.title: Industrial Waste Elimination
ops.problem: At Welspun Vapi’s Terry Towels weaving unit, our project tackled a high-volume, structurally recurring waste problem in dobby loom production: mock-selvage trimming was generating ~2 kg of hard waste per loom per day, which scaled to nearly 300 kg/day across 168 looms (about 9,000 kg/month and 109,500 kg/year), much of it difficult to recycle because it was a mixed-fibre (polyester-cotton) waste stream.
approach: identified root cause in loom setup.

ops.title: INZEX Dashboards + Backend
ops.subtitle: Ops analytics & reporting
ops.problem: Inzex’s reporting workflow relied on fragmented spreadsheets and manual tracking, making it difficult to get a clear, timely view of campaign performance, operational KPIs, and decision-critical trends.
approach: Designed and deployed a centralized dashboarding workflow that consolidated fragmented operational and marketing data into a structured reporting system, using Excel-based data cleaning, KPI mapping, and visual summaries to make performance tracking faster, clearer, and more decision-ready.
impact: Reporting and analytics outcomes are documented in the linked folder.
